context_bundle.summary: PAD Excel actions: Launch/Attach, Read/Write cells, Worksheets (Set/Get/Add/Delete/Rename/GetAll), Find/Replace, Macro, First Free Row/Col, Select/Copy/Paste, Insert/Delete Row/Col, Save/Close

onboarding.quick_start: Launch Excel -> Read from worksheet (range A1:D10) -> Process %ExcelData% datatable -> Write to worksheet -> Close Excel (save)
common_patterns: Read from Excel worksheet range A1:D10 first row headers:True -> %ExcelData%
Write %DataTable% to Excel worksheet column A row 1
Get first free column/row -> append data at %FirstFreeRow%
Find and replace 'old' with 'new' in all matches
known_errors: Excel instance not visible - set Make instance visible:True
Password protected files need password parameter
Writing DataTable overwrites cells to right and below
